name: REST API Endpoints for Paid Memberships Pro
author: Thomas Sjolshagen <thomas@eighty20results.com>

sections.description: REST API Endpoints for Paid Memberships Pro. Supports access check (hasaccess endpoint) for a Post based on supplied post ID [<numeric ID>], and a user ID [<numeric ID>]. Supports identifying the current membership level (getlevelforuser endpoint) based on supplied <numeric user ID>
sections.changelog:
1.2.1

  1. BUG/FIX: Didn't return error for invalid user IDs

1.2

  1. ENHANCEMENT: Update plugin header
  2. ENHANCEMENT: Update licence text
  3. ENHANCEMENT: Add conditional definition of pmproRestAPI class
  4. ENHANCEMENT: Refactor for WP code style
  5. ENHANCEMENT: Add stub for plugin activation
  6. ENHANCEMENT: Add stub for plugin deactivation
  7. ENHANCEMENT: Add initial function to support different post types, including Custom Post Types (CPTs)
  8. ENHANCEMENT: Simplify routes for endpoints/requests
  9. ENHANCEMENT: Use plugin slug as translation domain
  10. ENHANCEMENT: Add & update the readme.txt file

1.1

  1. BUG/FIX: Endpoint fixed for Checking access to a post for a user of a certain level (hasaccess)
  2. BUG/FIX: Endpoint fixed for getting the membership level for a specific user ID (getmembershiplevel)
sections.faq:
I found a bug in the plugin.

Please report your issue to us by using the Support Forum on The Eighty / 20 Website and we'll normally respond within 1 business day.
